self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SF12 v2.0 Standard Test Name Terminology

definition: Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 test name.

terms.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 - Bodily pain 0-100 score.
terms.preferredTerm: SF12 v2.0 Standard - Bodily Pain 0-100 Score

terms.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 - Bodily pain norm-based score.
terms.preferredTerm: SF12 v2.0 Standard - Bodily Pain Norm-Based Score

terms.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past 4 weeks - did you have a lot of energy?
terms.preferredTerm: SF12 v2.0 Standard - Did You Have a Lot of Energy
terms.submissionValue: SF123-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
synonyms: SF123-Did You Have a Lot of Energy

terms.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - accomplished less than you would like.
terms.preferredTerm: SF12 v2.0 Standard - Emotional: Accomplished Less

terms.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Standard, US Version 2.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - did work or other activities less carefully than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: SF12 v2.0 Standard - Emotional: Did Work Less Carefully
